subject: p19182863
History: -year-old female with questionable pneumonia on CT.
Findings: Right lower lobe opacities are present although compared to there has significantly improved. The time course of improvement does not fit well for pneumonia and more likely represented atelectasis superimposed with edema. The left lung is clear. Cardiac size is stable. The patient is status post median sternotomy and valvular replacements.
